title: Virus-infected bacteria could provide help in the fight against climate change

title_detail.value: Virus-infected bacteria could provide help in the fight against climate change

summary: Understanding the relationship between microbes and viruses is beneficial not only for medical research and practical applications but also in marine biology, say researchers.

summary_detail.value: Understanding the relationship between microbes and viruses is beneficial not only for medical research and practical applications but also in marine biology, say researchers.
